CmdLine: mkdir -p /opt/build/ant &&      mkdir -p /opt/build/tmp &&      curl -o /opt/build/tmp/ant.zip https://www.apache.org/dist/ant/binaries/apache-ant-1.10.3-bin.zip &&      unzip /opt/build/tmp/ant.zip -d /opt/build/tmp/ant &&      cp -R /opt/build/tmp/ant/apache-ant-1.10.3/. /opt/build/ant &&      curl -o /opt/build/tmp/ivy.zip https://www.apache.org/dist/ant/ivy/2.4.0/apache-ivy-2.4.0-bin.zip &&      unzip /opt/build/tmp/ivy.zip -d /opt/build/tmp/ivy &&      cp /opt/build/tmp/ivy/apache-ivy-2.4.0/ivy-2.4.0.jar /opt/build/ant/lib &&      rm -r /opt/build/tmp
Commands.Name: run
